Description: Launching the Mesosphere DCOS cluster + BIG-IP

Fn::Join: Description=AWS Setup: Formats the /var/lib ephemeral drive
Description=Pkgpanda: Download DC/OS to this host.
Description=Pkgpanda: Specialize DC/OS for this host.

Properties.GroupDescription: Enable access to all ports in the external net

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash
. /tmp/firstrun.config
FILE=/tmp/firstrun.log
if [ ! -e $FILE ]; then
   touch $FILE
   nohup $0 0<&- &>/dev/null &
   exit
fi
function checkF5Ready {
   sleep 5
   while [[ ! -e '/var/prompt/ps1' ]]; do
      echo -n '.'
      sleep 5
   done 
   sleep 5
   STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/ps1`
   while [[ ${STATUS}x != 'NO LICENSE'x ]]; do
      echo -n '.'
      sleep 5
      STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/ps1`
   done
   echo -n ' '
   while [[ ! -e '/var/prompt/cmiSyncStatus' ]]; do
      echo -n '.'
      sleep 5
   done 
   STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/cmiSyncStatus`
   while [[ ${STATUS}x != 'Standalone'x ]]; do
      echo -n '.'
      sleep 5
      STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/cmiSyncStatus`
   done
}
function checkStatusnoret {
   sleep 10
   STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/ps1`
   while [[ (${STATUS}x != 'Active'x) && (${STATUS}x != 'Standby'x) ]]; do
      echo -n '.'
      sleep 5
      STATUS=`cat /var/prompt/ps1`
   done
}
exec 1<&-
exec 2<&-
exec 1<>$FILE
exec 2>&1
checkF5Ready
sleep 150
echo 'starting tmsh config'
tmsh modify sys ntp timezone ${TZ}
tmsh modify sys ntp servers add { 0.pool.ntp.org 1.pool.ntp.org }
tmsh modify sys dns name-servers add { ${NAME_SERVER} }
tmsh modify sys db setup.run value false
tmsh modify sys global-settings hostname ${HOSTNAME}
INSTANCEID=`curl http://169.254.169.254/1.0/meta-data/instance-id`
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  tmsh modify auth user admin password $INSTANCEID
  echo "Set admin password to instance ID"
else
  tmsh modify auth user admin password GoF5!
fi
tmsh save /sys config
tmsh create net vlan external interfaces add { 1.1 } 
tmsh create net self ${EXTIP}/${EXTMASK} vlan external
tmsh create net vlan internal interfaces add { 1.2 } 
tmsh create net self ${INTIP}/${INTMASK} vlan internal
tmsh create net route default gw ${GATEWAY}
tmsh create /auth partition mesos
tmsh modify sys folder /mesos traffic-group traffic-group-local-only
tmsh mv cm device bigip1 ${HOSTNAME}
if [ -n "${REGKEY}" ]; then
  tmsh save /sys config
  echo 'start install licensing'
  tmsh install /sys license registration-key ${REGKEY}
  sleep 20
fi
tmsh save /sys config
checkStatusnoret
sleep 30
tmsh modify sys db dhclient.mgmt { value disable }
tmsh save /sys config
GATEWAY_MAC=`ifconfig eth1 | egrep HWaddr | awk '{print tolower($5)}'`
Description=AWS Setup: Formats the /var/lib ephemeral drive
Description=Pkgpanda: Download DC/OS to this host.
Description=Pkgpanda: Specialize DC/OS for this host.

MarathonUI.Description: Point a browser here to get to Marathon

InternalMarathonURL.Description: Get to marathon service from inside the VPC

BIGIPAdminIP.Description: Public IP of the BIG-IP's admin interface

BIGIPAdminPassword.Description: Password to log in to BIG-IP UI with (CLI: use SSH)

BIGIPAdminPrivateIP.Description: IP that f5-marathon-lb will admin BIG-IP via

BIGIPExternalPrivateIP.Description: IP that BIG-IP will listen on for web connections

FrontendExample.Description: URL of the mock frontend web application

FrontendExampleInsecure.Description: URL of the mock frontend web application served over HTTP

SplunkReadySSH.Description: SSH to an instance that is ready to install Splunk

KeyName.Description: Required: Specify your AWS EC2 Key Pair.

AdminLocation.Description: Optional: Specify the IP range to whitelist for access to the admin zone. Must be a valid CIDR.

SlaveInstanceCount.Description: Required: Specify the number of MESOS slave nodes

BIGIPRegKey.ConstraintDescription: Please verify your F5 BYOL regkey.
BIGIPRegKey.Description: F5 BIG-IP BYOL license regkey (or empty to license manually)
